mapper.sql: id as id, asn_id as asnId, transport_service_provider as transportServiceProvider, tracking_number as trackingNumber, sender_target_name as senderTargetName, sender_target_mobile_phone as senderTargetMobilePhone, sender_target_telephone as senderTargetTelephone, sender_target_country as senderTargetCountry, sender_target_province as senderTargetProvince, sender_target_city as senderTargetCity, sender_target_district as senderTargetDistrict, sender_target_villages_towns as senderTargetVillagesTowns, sender_target_address as senderTargetAddress, sender_target_email as senderTargetEmail, sender_target_zip as senderTargetZip, ou_id as ouId
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_wh_asn_transport_mgmt ( id, asn_id , transport_service_provider , tracking_number , sender_target_name , sender_target_mobile_phone , sender_target_telephone , sender_target_country , sender_target_province , sender_target_city , sender_target_district , sender_target_villages_towns , sender_target_address , sender_target_email , sender_target_zip , ou_id ) VALUES ( #{id,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{asnId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{transportServiceProvider,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{trackingNumber,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{senderTargetName,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{senderTargetMobilePhone,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{senderTargetTelephone,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{senderTargetCountry,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{senderTargetProvince,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{senderTargetCity,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{senderTargetDistrict,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{senderTargetVillagesTowns,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{senderTargetAddress,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{senderTargetEmail,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{senderTargetZip,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{ouId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_wh_asn_transport_mgmt SET asn_id = #{asnId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , transport_service_provider = #{transportServiceProvider,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , tracking_number = #{trackingNumber,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , sender_target_name = #{senderTargetName,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , sender_target_mobile_phone = #{senderTargetMobilePhone,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , sender_target_telephone = #{senderTargetTelephone,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , sender_target_country = #{senderTargetCountry,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , sender_target_province = #{senderTargetProvince,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , sender_target_city = #{senderTargetCity,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , sender_target_district = #{senderTargetDistrict,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , sender_target_villages_towns = #{senderTargetVillagesTowns,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , sender_target_address = #{senderTargetAddress,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , sender_target_email = #{senderTargetEmail,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , sender_target_zip = #{senderTargetZip,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , ou_id = #{ouId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} WHERE id = #{id}
